Mohamadou Sumareh (amụrụ na 20 Septemba 1994) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu maka otu Malaysia Super League Johor Darul Ta'zim
A mụrụ ya na Gambia, ọ na-anọchite anya ndị otu mba Malaysia.
Sumareh nwetara nwa amaala Malaysia site na ịbụ nwa amaala na 2018 ma nọchite anya ndị otu mba ha kemgbe ahụ
Mohamadou Sumareh malitere ọrụ ya na Terengganu na Jenụwarị 2012
Sumareh kwagara Polis Di Raja Malaysia na December 2012
Na December 2015 o sonyeere Perlis, na-eme egwuregwu 19 egwuregwu na-ebute ihe mgbaru ọsọ 5
Okwu Sumareh na Perlis akwụsịghị ogologo oge na na December 2016 ọ sonyeere Pahang, na-eme egwuregwu 98 na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ 17 na afọ 5
Sumareh sonyeere ọgbakọ Johor Darul Ta'zim ugbu a na February 2021
N'ihe gbasara otuto onwe onye, Sumareh nwere otu nturu ugo nturu ugo Malaysian Midfielder nke Year n'aha ya.
